main: Gains {status:TheUdjatOutis} with her passive on 3x Gloom Res or if an enemy has a panic changing debuff. This is basically a constant in a Sinking team. The buff gives her more damage, {status:Protection}, speed, and better clashing against enemies. It also lets her inflict {status:SheutFracture} on hit.

Her S3 inflicts {status:BlueSand} which is a panic changing debuff that reduces clash power and speed and inflicts {status:Sinking} Count when the enemy loses the clash. It also inflicts {status:AzureResistDown} and {status:AzureTakeDamageUp}.
other: Her S3 consumes 4 {status:LCA_Bullet} inflicting more damage and additional {status:SheutFracture} on hit if she has {status:TheUdjatOutis}. She has 16 ammo and reloads automatically up to 5 times, making it functionally infinite in most cases. You'll need to use her S3 24 times to run out.

1111401.desc:
Deal +5% damage for every [Protection] on self (max 15%)

Combat Start: gain 2 [TheUdjatOutis]
1111401.name: Vanguard Team

1111402.desc:
Turn Start: If an enemy has any of the Panic type changing effects, gain 1 [TheUdjatOutis]

If this unit has [TheUdjatOutis], inflict 1 [SheutFracture] On Hit with a Base Attack Skill (15 per turn)

[Protection] Stack gained from this unit's Base Skills and [TheUdjatOutis] effect is capped at 5 per turn
1111402.name: The Scepter of Horus - Replica

1111412.desc:
Turn Start: If an enemy has any of the Panic type changing effects, gain 1 [TheUdjatOutis]

If this unit has [TheUdjatOutis], inflict 1 [SheutFracture] On Hit with a Base Attack Skill (15 per turn)
- If [LCA_Bullet] was spent, inflict additional [SheutFracture] per [LCA_Bullet] spent

[Protection] Stack gained from this unit's Base Skills and [TheUdjatOutis] effect is capped at 5 per turn
1111412.name: The Scepter of Horus - Replica

1111421.desc: Combat Start: apply 1 [Protection] next turn to 1 ally with the lowest HP percentage
